main event: A glowing red object shaped like a banana was observed flying south for 5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was reported to be a globbing, glowing red and banana-shaped., The sighting lasted for 5 minutes., The observation was made by a civilian source., There were no photographs present., The object's course was directly south.
sighted object: glowing red object shaped like a banana
witness description: A woman, age 27, located in Ohio.
